description: List of scores that can be achieved with four darts all of which hit a dartboard with regions labeled 1, 5, 10, 25.
comments: Seen on a list of puzzles circa 1998. The explanation was supplied by Antonio G. Astudillo, Nov 24 2011.
references: Tom Bassarear, Mathematics for Elementary School Teachers, Houghton Mifflin Company, 2007, 4th ed. (see Exercise 15 on page 55 and its solution on page A-5). - From Antonio G. Astudillo.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
